text: Auxon-Dessus is a former commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Doubs department in east France. On 1 January 2015, the former communes of Auxon-Dessus and Auxon-Dessous joined together and became the new commune of Les Auxons. Arrêté de la Préfecture du Doubs n°2014272-0014 du 29 septembre 2014 portant création de la commune nouvelle des Auxons au 1er janvier 2015. == References == Category:Former communes in Doubs
title: Auxon-Dessus
